This is an *unofficial* FFmpeg Win32 build.

This file was originally hosted at: http://arrozcru.no-ip.org/ffmpeg_builds/
The source code it was built with can also be found on the page above.
The revision number is: 7070
The license is: LGPL

If you experience any problems with this build, please report them to:
http://arrozcru.no-ip.org/ffmpeg_forum/
